fields.label: General
fields.instructions: Basic configuration and general function settings.

sub_fields.label: Search form
sub_fields.name: search_form
sub_fields.instructions: Turn off the search form on the website.

sub_fields.label: Theme toggler
sub_fields.name: theme_toggler
sub_fields.instructions: Turn off the theme toggler on the website.

sub_fields.label: Breadcrumbs
sub_fields.name: breadcrumbs
sub_fields.instructions: Turn off the breadcrumbs on the website.

sub_fields.label: Pagination
sub_fields.name: pagination
sub_fields.instructions: Turn off the pagination on the website.

sub_fields.label: Preloader
sub_fields.name: preloader
sub_fields.instructions: Turn on preloader mode.

sub_fields.label: Under construction
sub_fields.name: under_construction
sub_fields.instructions: Turn on under construction mode.

fields.label: SMTP
fields.instructions: Add contact information and/or social media links and other.

sub_fields.label: Host
sub_fields.name: host
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the SMTP host settings.

sub_fields.label: Username
sub_fields.name: username
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the SMTP username.

sub_fields.label: Password
sub_fields.name: password
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the SMTP password.

sub_fields.label: Encryption
sub_fields.name: encryption
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the SMTP encryption.

sub_fields.label: Port
sub_fields.name: port
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the SMTP encryption port.

sub_fields.label: Email
sub_fields.name: email
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the 'From' email address that will be used to send emails.

sub_fields.label: Name
sub_fields.name: name
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the name that will appear as the sender of the email.

fields.label: Grid
fields.instructions: You can configure the grid layout for post blocks.

sub_fields.label: Archive
sub_fields.name: archive
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the number of blocks.

sub_fields.label: Author
sub_fields.name: author
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the number of blocks.

sub_fields.label: Category
sub_fields.name: category
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the number of blocks.

sub_fields.label: Search
sub_fields.name: search
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the number of blocks.

sub_fields.label: Tag
sub_fields.name: tag
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the number of blocks.

sub_fields.label: Taxonomy
sub_fields.name: taxonomy
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the number of blocks.

fields.label: Logo
fields.instructions: Upload or set your website logo here.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Upload your logo image, which will appear in the top left block of the navbar and footer.

sub_fields.label: Width
sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: Set the optimal logo width based on the size of your image.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: It will be displayed if no image logo is set and will be used for the copyright in the footer.

fields.label: Metadata
fields.instructions: Add contact information and/or social media links and other.

sub_fields.label: Email
sub_fields.name: email
sub_fields.instructions: Display your email in the bottom navigation bar.

sub_fields.label: Phone
sub_fields.name: phone
sub_fields.instructions: Display your phone number in the bottom navigation bar.

fields.label: Social media
fields.name: wpde_social_media
fields.instructions: Display your social media accounts in the footer.

fields.label: Navbar
fields.instructions: You can configure the navbar layout.

sub_fields.label: Position
sub_fields.name: position
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the navbar position behavior.

sub_fields.label: Layout
sub_fields.name: layout
sub_fields.instructions: Configure the navbar layout.

sub_fields.label: Link 2

sub_fields.instructions: Set the second link.

sub_fields.label: Cart
sub_fields.name: cart
sub_fields.instructions: Hide WooCommerce shopping cart.
